runs.description: Runs in each category made by player, 1st index is normal runs, 2nd is 4's, 3rd is 6's

balls.description: Number of balls the batter has faced

dismissal.description: If populated the player will be shown as out

batting.description: If true the batter is currently on the pitch, false if the batter has yet to bat or has gone out

facing.description: If true the batter is facing the bowler, false if the batter is running
